question:
Consider the following statements about the National Commission for Women:
  1. It is a statutory body 
  2. It consists of chairperson, five members and a member secretary appointed by central government
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
It is a statutory body
This is a correct statement. NCW was  set up as statutory body in January 1992 under the National Commission for Women Act, 1990 ( Act No. 20 of 1990 of Govt.of India ). 
It consists of chairperson, five members and a member secretary appointed by central government
This is also a correct statement about composition of NCW.
